sect1.title: Making the LFS System Bootable
sect1.para: Create a silo.conf file defining silo's boot menu:

screen.userinput:
cat > /etc/silo.conf << "EOF" # Begin /etc/silo.conf partition = 1 # Boot partition (= root partition) root = /dev/sda1 # Root partition timeout = 150 # Wait 15 seconds before booting the default section
image = /boot/lfskernel-&linux-sparc64-version; label = linux # End /etc/silo.conf EOF
